name: UFOBIA
description:
UFOBIA is a first-person action horror adventure where police officers are called in to investigate an ongoing kidnapping in a abandoned mine.

Features

  • Survive in the fight against beings from another planet.
  • Explore the woods, villages and an abandoned mine for clues.
  • Solve puzzles and find specific items to advance the investigation.

Everything is better with friends!

  • Invite your friends to help with the investigation.
